title: Deadly Evidence
description: A dangerous reunion they may not surviveIn this Mount Shasta Secrets novelFBI agent Tori Peterson intends to find her sister's murderer, even if someone's willing to kill her to keep the truth hidden. But that means returning home and working with the lead detective--her ex-boyfriend, Ryan Bradley. Though sparks still fly between them, Tori and Ryan must stay focused on catching a killer...before they are silenced for good.
author: Elizabeth Goddard
